name: video_play
description: This function is used to play a video on a SmartThings device like a TV.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to play the video.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to play the video.

parameters.name: appname
parameters.description: The name of the application to play the video (e.g., Netflix, YouTube).

parameters.name: predefinedAppName
parameters.description: The predefined application name to play the video.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the video to play.

parameters.name: cast
parameters.description: The cast of the video to play.
